attributes.action: Only let students who can’t work at home to attend school.
attributes.additional_details:
With the R rate increasing, it is important that once again certain restrictions are put in place. 

Giving students the option as to whether they need to attend school or not could have a drastic affect in he spread of the virus. So, to students who can’t focus at home, or didn’t complete any work during the last lockdown, then they will need to attend school like normal. However in order to lower the number of students attending schools, allowing the certain students to work from home will help.
attributes.background: If students who are able to work from home are allowed to do so, then the spread of coronavirus will be slowed down. If children struggle to work from home, or simply don’t have the right resources, then they should attend school.
